title: Shroud Encounter Coming to Cresson, PA and Buffalo, NY
post:
Finally somewhere close! Niagra Falls, NY is only a couple hours drive. I might just make it out to this ‘Encounter’…Would really enjoy meeting Russ too. Here’s hoping I can make it on that date.
R
author: Ron

title: Shroud Encounter Coming to Cresson, PA and Buffalo, NY
